snippet.title: ANNOUNCE TRAILER | MONOPOLY MADNESS
snippet.description:
Would you like to become the new Mr. Monopoly? It’s your lucky day! Our favourite Real-Estate Mogul is going on a well-earned vacation and he’s looking for a temporary stand-in. The method of selection? A race for fame and fortune. This time the rules have slightly changed. MONOPOLY Madness brings the MONOPOLY experience into the arena for the first time ever. Roam the chaotic streets of Monopoly City, collect resources, buy and upgrade properties, mess with your opponents, and avoid their tricks to win the race for riches. This is madness!

MONOPOLY Madness will be available on December 9th  2021 on PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, Switch, Stadia, Ubisoft Connect PC, Epic games and Luna.
